thread.title: Viad Corp Will Present August 27, 2015, at the 2015 Midwest Ideas Investor Conference
thread.title_full: Viad Corp Will Present August 27, 2015, at the 2015 Midwest Ideas Investor Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Viad Corp Will Present August 27, 2015, at the 2015 Midwest Ideas Investor Conference
text:
Viad Corp
PHOENIX , Aug. 20, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Viad Corp (NYSE:VVI) today announced that the company will deliver a presentation Thursday, August 27 , at the Midwest Ideas Investor Conference in Chicago, Illinois .
The presentation by Steve Moster , president and chief executive officer of Viad Corp, will begin at 3:10 p.m. CDT . A copy of the presentation and a link to the audio webcast will be available on Viad's Web site at www.viad.com .
About Viad
Viad is an S&P SmallCap 600 company. Viad operates through its Marketing & Events Group, composed of Global Experience Specialists, and affiliates, and its Travel & Recreation Group, composed of Brewster, Glacier Park, Inc. and Alaska Denali Travel. For more information, visit the company's Web site at www.viad.com .
Contacts:
Carrie Long
Viad Corp
(602) 207-2681
IR@viad.com
